attributes.action: Review powers, funding, guidelines and procedures regarding children under the care of social services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to have social services reviewed and to have the interests of the children, teenagers specifically however not exclusively, being put first. 

And to review the 'emergency intervention' of social services prior to a proper assessment, provided it is ever done, of wether the child's relationships/associations endanger the child's welfare or well being.
